tools.name: jira_connection_status
tools.title: Jira Connection Status
tools.description: Returns non-sensitive connection state for a Jira connection reference.

securityBoundary.notes: No token material may appear in request or response payloads.

tools.name: jira_list_attachments
tools.title: List Jira Issue Attachments
tools.description: Lists attachment metadata for a Jira issue using an opaque connection reference.

securityBoundary.notes: Authentication resolved server-side from connection_id only.

tools.name: jira_attach_artifact
tools.title: Attach Local Artifact to Jira Issue
tools.description: Attaches a selected local artifact to a Jira issue using an opaque connection reference.

artifact_ref.description: Opaque local artifact reference. Not a raw secret.

securityBoundary.notes: PAT never appears in MCP payloads; backend vault resolves credentials per request.

tools.name: jira_disconnect
tools.title: Disconnect Jira Connection
tools.description: Revokes use of a Jira connection and invalidates future credential-backed operations.

securityBoundary.notes: Operation revokes server-side credential use without returning secret details.

textFallbackRequirement: All tool responses must include user-actionable text for non-UI MCP hosts.
